name: K4-L1
description:
A single player VR puzzle game in which you play as a starship engineer waking up in a cold abandonned vessel.

You need to find out what happened to the ship and how to reactivate the ship's reactor to go back to Earth.

Mainly played and tested on Oculus Quest 2.

We don't plan on making any fix or any more work on this project post-release, please understand.

Done in 2 months and a half by three french 3D students :

FANTONI Antoine (concept art, environment design, UI & UX design, 3D modelling, texturing)

https://www.linkedin.com/in/fantoni-antoine-62430086/

https://www.artstation.com/antoine99

DIGNON Lancelot (concept art, environment design, level design, character design, 3D modelling, texturing)

DUTHIER Matiaz (dev without code knowledge, integration, gameplay, 3D modelling, level design, puzzle design)

https://www.artstation.com/zed3ty

https://www.linkedin.com/in/matiaz-duthier/
